snippet: Kendrys Morales had three hits, and the Minnesota Twins beat the Blue Jays, 7-2, on Wednesday, giving Phil Hughes his first win at Toronto in almost three years.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Minnesota Twins defeat Toronto Blue Jays, 7-2; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Kendrys Morales had three hits, and the Minnesota Twins beat the Blue Jays, 7-2, on Wednesday, giving Phil Hughes his first win at Toronto in almost three years.
